videoformat: AVI (Motion JPEG compression format with monaural sound
flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Front curtain, Rear curtain, Red-Eye, Slow Sync
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View.
whitebalancing: Custom White Balance (5), White Balance Presets (12), Auto (TTL white-balance with 420-pixel RGB sensor), 12 manual modes with fine-tuning; color temperature setting; preset white balance; white balance bracketing
imageformat: JPEG ( Fine, Normal & Basic Quality ), NEF (12 bit compressed RAW),JPEG (Baseline-compliant)
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.5x), No. Of Focus Points (11)
shootingmodes: Single frame shooting mode, Continuous low shooting mode: 1-4fps, Continuous high shooting mode: 4.5fps, Self-timer mode, Delay remote mode, Quick-response remote mode, D-Movie
display: 3.0 inch Super Density TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle
